actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to declare Lake Coeur d'Alene, Lake Chatcolet, Hidden Lake, Round Lake, and the lower reaches of the St. Joe River, in the State of Idaho, to be nonnavigable waters.

summary.text: Declares Lake Coeur d'Alene, Lake Chatcolet, Hidden Lake, Round Lake, and the lower reaches of the Saint Joe River, in the State of Idaho, to be nonnavigable waters within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to declare Lake Coeur d'Alene, Lake Chatcolet, Hidden Lake, Round Lake, and the lower reaches of the St. Joe River, in the State of Idaho, to be nonnavigable waters.
